tool_description: Examines artwork under ultraviolet light to reveal hidden information about materials, previous treatments, and authenticity markers through fluorescence patterns.

examination_areas.description: Areas to examine under UV (signature, surface, edges, verso)

error_messages: Invalid artwork_id: Provide a valid artwork identifier from metadata record.
Invalid UV wavelength: Wavelength must be between 315-400 nanometers.
Invalid exposure duration: Exposure time must be between 5-300 seconds.
Empty examination areas: Must specify at least one area to examine under UV.
UV safety protocol violation: Ensure proper eye protection and ventilation before UV examination.
usage: Reference existing artwork record and specify examination areas. Tool will analyze UV fluorescence patterns to identify materials, treatments, and authenticity markers.

fluorescence_patterns.description: Observed fluorescence colors and patterns by area

authenticity_markers.description: UV-revealed information relevant to authenticity assessment
